title: Ranked Solo Solved
body:
So, I made a post not to long ago, about why my LP gains were so little. EX: (10 LP per win)
I submitted a ticket to ask why this was and I got an email back...

Since my MMR is low is 1 reason, which I don't know why my MMR is low to begin with.
The second reason is because I dominate each game by myself and have a strong win streak 9 game win streak right now to be exact, its making me have low LP gains per win.

I figured since I'm doing so good my LP gains would be higher, now that's not the case, it makes me have lower LP gains.

Does anyone else think this is kinda BS?
